TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Zipun, title = Zipun, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zipun} }

S.FORM: == satangahan : == Zipun saca Lipun u zuma a kamu : nu Hulam :日本 nu Amilika :Japen nu Zipun :日本国 nilacul: i sawalian nu Yaco a tukus ku kitakit nu Zipun, u saupu nu kasakatakatal a ocong nu bayu' kalakanatal, Unu Zipun atu Liwkiw kasaupuan, maala ku enem malebut walu lasebu lima bataan izaw ku tusa(6852) kasaupuan ku kasakatakat, u kumud mazu'ay nu binawlan, ulu bataan izaw ku pitu salabas tu walu(37.8) a emang nu Pinghuwangkungli. I sawalian nu Uya a tukus, matabu nu Taypinyang a bayu, pasaamis u oluses a kanatal, satipan sibiyaw tu Kuliya a Kanatal, saetietipan nu katimul sa, u bayu ku laed tu Tayliwku atu Taywan a kanatal, u binawlan sa, cacay silabas tu tusa ira ku enem a Oku , sakamuketep ku kaaluman nu kasibinawlan nu Sikay ku Zipun, malawit ku tulu malebut lima lasebu(3500) a emang ku tademaw, mazu' i kasatukay nu Tukiw atu lilisay niyazu', u satataangaytu nu masatukayay nu Sikay. u pikuwan nu kitakit sa, liliden nu hungti ku saupu nu giing a patilengtu sakuwan a likec . "Tinnunika" han ku hungti, u kakibana' tu "Zipun" a binawlan atu kanatal. u saupu nu giing atu mamikuwan tu kawaw nu kanatal ku situdungay a mikuwan tu kanatal. namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan ː malaalitin tu i hekalay atu zumaay a natinengan ː

== satangahan : == Zipon saca Lipon o zoma a kamo : no Holam :日本 no Amilika :Japen no Zipon :日本国 nilacol: i sawalian no Yaco a tokos ko kitakit no Zipon, o saopo no kasakatakatal a ocong no bayo' kalakanatal, Uno Zipon ato Liwkiw kasaopoan, maala ko enem malebot walo lasebo lima bataan izaw ko tosa(6852) kasaopoan ko kasakatakat, o komod mazo'ay no binawlan, olo bataan izaw ko pito salabas to walo(37.8) a emang no Pinghowangkongli. I sawalian no Uya a tokos, matabo no Taypinyang a bayo, pasaamis o oloses a kanatal, satipan sibiyaw to Koliya a Kanatal, saetietipan no katimol sa, o bayo ko laed to Tayliwko ato Taywan a kanatal, o binawlan sa, cacay silabas to tosa ira ko enem a Oko , sakamoketep ko kaaloman no kasibinawlan no Sikay ko Zipon, malawit ko tolo malebot lima lasebo(3500) a emang ko tademaw, mazo' i kasatokay no Tokiw ato lilisay niyazo', o satataangayto no masatokayay no Sikay. o pikowan no kitakit sa, liliden no hongti ko saopo no giing a patilengto sakowan a likec . "Tinnonika" han ko hongti, o kakibana' to "Zipon" a binawlan ato kanatal. o saopo no giing ato mamikowan to kawaw no kanatal ko sitodongay a mikowan to kanatal. namakayniay a nasolitan nasakamoan ato natinengan ː malaalitin to i hekalay ato zomaay a natinengan ː
